title: Marketing Executive Assistant
job_overview:
Please Note: This position requires a minimum of 5 years of experience supporting C-suite executives, preferably with a focus on Marketing Executive Assistant responsibilities. 

Job Summary:
We are seeking a highly organized, marketing-savvy to support our fast-paced marketing team. This role works closely with the Director of Affiliate Partnerships and senior marketing leadership to drive execution across campaigns, affiliate partnerships, performance reporting, and cross-functional collaboration. The ideal candidate is equal parts proactive project manager, detailed communicator, and data-literate marketer. You’ll be the go-to person to keep campaigns on track, help onboard partners, prepare high-quality marketing deliverables, and ensure the marketing department runs like a well-oiled machine.

Key Responsibilities: 
• Campaign & Project Management: Organize timelines and assets for paid ad campaigns, affiliate initiatives, and influencer partnerships.
• Cross-Team Coordination: Liaise with internal teams including content, development, media buyers, and design to meet deadlines and launch schedules.
• Affiliate & Influencer Support: Assist in outreach, onboarding, and ongoing communication with affiliate and influencer partners. Support meetings, prep materials, and follow up on tasks.
• Executive Support: Provide day-to-day assistance to the Director of Affiliate Partnerships and senior marketing team—including preparing briefs, proposals, reports, and email communications.
• Tool & Platform Management: Help maintain marketing tech stack tools, including CRM platforms, tracking dashboards, and project management software.
• Quality Control: Proofread and format marketing materials, catching copy or formatting issues before delivery.
• Performance Tracking: Monitor key marketing KPIs like CPL, ROAS, and conversion rates using tools like Google Ads, Meta Ads, Salesforce, and Wicked Reports.
• Problem-Solving: Proactively identify roadblocks and help resolve issues to keep projects moving efficiently and on deadline.
